dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
Paralleltask is a simple and lightweight parallel task engine. It can
launch a given number of tasks from a batch of independent tasks, and
keep this number of running tasks until all tasks are completed.
dependencies.name: py-paralleltask

description: NextDenovo is a string graph-based de novo assembler for long reads.
name: nextdenovo

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
